resonance.name: Soothing Water
resonance.description: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time. Increases Max HP by 25%

reactions.name: Vaporize
reactions.description: Deals x2 Hydro damage to enemies affected by Pyro

reactions.name: Electro-Charged
reactions.description: Deals Electro damage over time to all nearby targets with the Wet status

reactions.name: Bloom
reactions.description: Creates a Dendro Core that explodes after 6 seconds, dealing AoE Dendro damage

sub-reactions.name: Hyperbloom
sub-reactions.description: Triggered when applying Electro to a Dendro Core. Transforms the Dendro Core into a homing Sprawling Shot that deals increased AoE Dendro damage in a much smaller AoE

sub-reactions.name: Burgeon
sub-reactions.description: Triggered when applying Pyro to a Dendro Core. Detonates the Dendro Core immediately, dealing increased AoE Dendro damage
